name: Conan O'Brian
monologue: A sinkhole has opened up on the White House lawn . So apparently, another one of Melania's tunnels collapsed. President Trump has demanded that Congress investigate the special prosecutor who is investigating him. Trump's remarks were published in this morning's issue of "Things Innocent People Say." President Trump met with the president of South Korea to discuss North Korea. The meeting consisted of five minutes about nuclear weapons, and 90 minutes of Trump saying, "So wait – which Korea are you again?" The U.S. Postal Service announced that they will release their first scratch-and-sniff stamps . That explains why they’ve canceled their "Salute to Kid Rock."
